name: Careful ! it's technical
description:
From CeliaLet, Beckndorf, Zorg and GranBermudo.

Try to save the crew of this falling apart spaceship!

It was our first time making an attempt at the Ludum Dare and we kinda overestimated our capacity to develop this project but we learned a lot.

As students in GameDev we hope to do better next time and push our project to the end !
